articles.author: LORNE COOK, TARA COPP
articles.title: NATO allies await US defense secretary's visit, the first by a member of the Trump administration - The Associated Press
articles.description: U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth will become on Wednesday the first member of the new Trump administration to visit NATO. European allies and Canada are keen to understand how America now plans to influence the war in Ukraine. Hegseth will take part in a m…
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth will on Wednesday become the first member of the new Trump administration to visit NATO, where the allies are keen to understand how America now plan… [+4520 chars]
